title: Bean Soup
ingredients: Â½ cup green chili peppers, chopped.
instructions: Step 1. In a pot, place the cooked beans with the whole beans and add the chicken broth.
Step 2. Gently mix so they combine well to form the soup.
Step 3. Let it simmer, then add the onion, chili pepper, and garlic.
Step 4. Season with salt and pepper.
Step 5. When serving, garnish with cilantro, boiled egg, and Del Rancho Chicharrones from Snacks Yummies.
